title: That 'Boy meets girl' thing compilation
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of the Arts, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Food
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Dating (Social customs)
abstract: Hot date (3 min. 1992)--Risk (9 min. 1994)--Slave to love (3 min. 1993)--The Drive home.
description: 4 shorts united by the theme of the unique male/female relationship dynamic. "Hot date" (dir. Kelly Wallwork): A woman out on a first date learns the hard way not to order the nachos with chillies. "Risk" (prod. Hugh Burton, dir. Christian Bernardi): Looi Prescott has asked a sexy waitress out to lunch. Does he act like his true self and consume the Creme Caramel as he is accustomed to? "Slave to love" (dir. Caroline Toomey): An elderly woman writes a hit romance novel, despite the distractions worthy of any juicy plot. "The Drive home" (dir. Annette Trevitt): While driving home a woman hears on the radio how to recognise your perfect match, provided she can make it through the tunnel and pick up radio frequency.
